title: Prisoners Are Back on U.S. Soil After Release by Russians

title: How Hamas Leader Ismail Haniyeh Was Killed in Iran
content: An explosive device hidden in a heavily guarded complex where Ismail Haniyeh was known to stay in Iran was what killed him, according to a Times investigation.

title: Israel Claims Killing of Militant Leader as Funerals Are Held for 2 Others
content: The fate of Muhammad Deif, a top Hamas leader, has been unclear, and the group has not confirmed his death. Funerals for senior officials from Hamas and Hezbollah, both of whom were assassinated this week, drew thousands.

title: Can Gouda’s Cheesemakers Stall a Sinking Future?
